name: the refreshing dungeon
description:
Reach the sun at the end of the dungeon that gives you a fresh start every time you die.

How to play: Use WASD to move and left click to shoot. Try to reach the end of the dungeon and touch the sun. If you die, all the enemies you kill stay dead. The longer you go without shooting, the faster you run.

Made for the GAB Game Jam with the theme Fresh Start!

Source code is available here.
